org.eclipse.viatra.emf.mwe2integration

Interface ITopic

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Topic

    public interface ITopic
    Interface that defines the base functions of a Topic object, which is used to implement message based communication between individual ITransformationStep objects. Transformation steps can add messages to or subscribe to these topics. The creation and procession of these events is done by IMessageFactory and IMessageProcessor objects.
    Author:
    Peter Lunk
